name: Chicken Shot for Pc
description:
Shoot the chicken and skip it to the block and go up! Up! Up! Up! Up.

Power control and timing are the key.

If you have a coin, you can go back to the previous level anytime, anywhere.

However, this button disappears at some point as it approaches the top.

Each map is ranked on the leaderboard when graded from C to S.

Compete with world users in a short time!
